title.value: Sowing time period influence on winter barley yield
Влияние сроков сева на урожайность озимого ячменя

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of studying the influence of the sowing period on the structure of productive stand, elements of productivity and crop capacity of winter barley (Hordeum vulgare) of Cinderella and Teresa varieties. It was established that the optimum period of sowing winter barley in the conditions of the Brest region (Belarus) is the period from the first till the beginning of the second ten days of September; sowing time for this region is to be between September 1 and September 15. In course of the study there was analysed influence of sowing terms on the productive stalk stand of winter barley; influence of sowing terms on the yielding capacity elements of barley head; and yielding capacity of barley depending on sowing terms. The recommended sowing period allows obtaining winter barley yield capacity on the level of 4,6-6,4 ton/ha.
